mapper.select: select id, follow_up_group_id, inpatient_number, name, sex, age, group_entry_time, outpatient_number, date_of_next_follow_up, follow_up_state from hospital.schedule_of_follow_up_group where id = #{id}
select id, follow_up_group_id, inpatient_number, name, sex, age, group_entry_time, outpatient_number from hospital.schedule_of_follow_up_group where follow_up_group_id = #{followUpGroupId}

select id, follow_up_group_id, inpatient_number, name, sex, age, group_entry_time, outpatient_number, date_of_next_follow_up, follow_up_state from hospital.schedule_of_follow_up_group limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into hospital.schedule_of_follow_up_group(follow_up_group_id, inpatient_number, name, sex, age, group_entry_time, outpatient_number, date_of_next_follow_up, follow_up_state) values (#{followUpGroupId}, #{inpatientNumber}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{groupEntryTime}, #{outpatientNumber}, #{dateOfNextFollowUp}, #{followUpState})
mapper.update:
update hospital.schedule_of_follow_up_group
follow_up_group_id = #{followUpGroupId},
inpatient_number = #{inpatientNumber},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
age = #{age},
group_entry_time = #{groupEntryTime},
outpatient_number = #{outpatientNumber},
date_of_next_follow_up = #{dateOfNextFollowUp},
follow_up_state = #{followUpState},
where id = #{id}
